```{r}
library("bsdlm")
library("dplyr")
library("tidyr")
library("VGAM")
library("ggplot2")

x <- seq(-3.5, 3.5, by=0.1)

hp <- dhp(x)
hp[is.infinite(hp)] <- NA

dist <- gather(data_frame(x = x,
                        horseshoe = hp,
                        normal = dnorm(x),
                        cauchy = dcauchy(x),
                        laplace = dlaplace(x)),
               distribution, y, -x)

gg1 <- (ggplot(dist, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = distribution))
        + geom_line()
        + theme_minimal(base_size = 10)
        + scale_x_continuous("x")
        + scale_y_continuous("p(x)"))

gg1
```
